name: Parser_unescapeEntitiesTest
description: Unit tests for the unescapeEntities method in the Parser class.

test_cases.name: testUnescapeEntitiesInAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests the unescapeEntities method with the inAttribute parameter set to true.

test_cases.name: testUnescapeEntitiesInText
test_cases.description: Tests the unescapeEntities method with the inAttribute parameter set to false.
